properties.sfomuseum:description: Airmail flight cover, part of International Tributes to the History of Flight series by the Postal Commemorative Society; white envelope with full color illustration and inset stamp commemorating first/inaugural flight by man on November 21, 1783, in Paris, France, by Pilatre de Rozier and Marquis d’Arlandes with hot-air balloon; commemorative cancellation stamp dated November 21, 1983 in Paris; includes information on reverse.
